text: "Cruel Summer" is a song by American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift from her seventh studio album, Lover, released on August 23, 2019. Swift wrote and produced the song with American musicians St. Vincent and Jack Antonoff. Year- end lists from Billboard and Rolling Stone ranked it one of the best songs of 2019. Category:2019 songs Category:2023 songs Category:Taylor Swift songs
title: Cruel Summer (Taylor Swift song)
